answers.answer: Hi!Burning sensation in the soles and feet can be due to plantar fasciitis, diabetes, Sjogren’s syndrome, peripheral neuropathies, hypothyroidism, SLE, alcoholism, peripheral artery disease, sciatica, sarcoidosis, amyloidosis and high blood pressure. You will need blood tests, nerve conduction studies and dopplar studies to reach a diagnosis. All these can also cause cramping and affect blood vessels. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: what causes thinning of veins, cramps and burning feet
title: mr
